text: Sommarkrysset is a Swedish television program. It is broadcast live from the Gröna Lund amusement park in Stockholm during summer. It was first shown on 3 June 2005.http://smdb.kb.se/catalog/search?q=Sommarkrysset+typ%3Atv&sort;=OLDEST == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:Music media Category:Djurgården Category:Television programs
title: Sommarkrysset
